DOC.brief_title: Stair Descending vs. Stair Ascending Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: Study design : Twelve elderly male chronic heart failure , New York Heart Association class I-II , participate study . Participants allocate two equally-sized group : stair descend group ( n = 6 ) stair ascend group ( n = 6 ) . At begin study , volunteer perform acute bout stair descend stair ascend exercise automatic escalator ( 4 set 3 min , speed set 45 steps∙min-1 ) . Step height 20.5 mm . Before day 2 post exercise , physiologic measurement perform blood sample collect . Then , participant carry six week stair descend ascend train consist three exercise session per week ( first two week speed set 45 steps∙min-1 , next two week 50 steps∙min-1 last two week 55 steps∙min-1 group ) . Afterward , repeat acute stair descend ascend protocol , carry begin study , physiologic measurement perform blood sample collect . Measurements : Isometric ( 90 knee flexion ) , concentric eccentric peak torque 60o∙s-1of quadriceps femoris , pain-free range motion , delay onset muscle soreness creatine kinase measure .
